item.content:encoded:

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer No
Fill material Type Memory Foam

Included Components 1 Lumbar cushion

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)


Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back.
Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience.
BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite
Mesh Cover
NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.
JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.
IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.
MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.
BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.

Samsonite’s Ultimate Support for your Lower Back

This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home

This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car

Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite’s High-Grade Memory Foam

Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort

This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)

item.title: Fire HD 8 Plus tablet, HD display, 64 GB, our best 8″ tablet for portable entertainment, Slate + Made for Amazon, Wireless Charging Dock
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 8″ HD display, 2X the storage (32 or 64 GB of internal storage and up to 1 TB with microSD card) + 3 GB RAM.All-day battery life & wireless charging in less than 3 hours with charging dock – Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.98 - $134.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:37 UTC – Details)



8″ HD display, 2X the storage (32 or 64 GB of internal storage and up to 1 TB with microSD card) + 3 GB RAM.
All-day battery life & wireless charging in less than 3 hours with charging dock – Up to 12 hours of reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music.
Wireless charging dock eliminates the need to plug in your Fire HD 8 Plus every time you want to charge it. The dock is always ready. Just drop your tablet in the dock and let it charge.
30% faster thanks to the new 2.0 GHz quad-core processor.
Enjoy your favorite apps like Netflix, Facebook, Hulu, Instagram, TikTok, and more through Amazon’s Appstore (Google Play not supported), plus 6 months free of Kindle Unlimited (you’ll receive the offer via email upon device activation).
Transform your tablet into an immersive, full-screen Alexa experience, optimized for visibility across the room. Just ask Alexa to show news, check the weather, view camera feeds, make a video call, set alarms, or play your favorite video and music, and much more.
Dock your Fire HD 8 Plus tablet in either portrait or landscape mode, and the cradle helps guide your tablet to ensure proper alignment

4.5
Price: $179.98 - $134.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:37 UTC – Details)

item.title: The Ultimate Easy to Clean XXL Puppy Whelping Pad 72″x72″ – Our Washable Super Absorption Pee Pad is Perfect for Your Whelping Box Or Exercise Playpen- The Durable Non Slip Floor Mat for Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL: To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day! WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE? We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

WE ONLY HAVE ONE GOAL:

To deliver beautiful and simplistic products that you love – every day!

WHAT MAKES US UNIQUE?

We are a small family-run company founded by John & Carrie in 2019. Our entire product line is proudly designed in the USA. We have a fantastic selection of stationery incl. planners & calendars, journals, organizers, and much more.

That “more” is providing the very best customer experience possible!

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 72 x 72 x 0.2 inches; 4.4 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ zic-peepad74-39
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 6, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ZICOTO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B085LLL9X9

Premium Non-Slip Material For Your Hardwood Floor: The bottom layer minimize the pad slipping on floors and stays safe in place; Top-notch materials & a heavy-duty black stitch design create a puppy pad with high durability
XXL Size For Playpens: With extra large 72″x72” the dog pen mat is perfectly sized for a standard indoor dog playpen/fence and it comes with rounded corners for the best fit
Washable & Reusable: Washable dog pee pads provide excellent value! Cut down the costs with reusable dog incontinence pads & simply put the pee pad up to 170°F in the washer & it will be like new
Extremely Versatile: Besides the benefits of the puppy training pads used for whelping or housebreaking, the piddle pads for dogs are also fantastic for floor and seat protection & as pads for any other pet playpen or rodent cages

THE REUSABLE ZICOTO DOG PEE PAD – 72″x72″

GROUNDBREAKING FOR WHELPING & RAISING PUPPIES

It is soft, waterproof, super absorbent and not only reduces any messy leaks, but also improves the well-being of your pup or adult dog: The premium washable dog pee pad for indoor dog pens from ZICOTO PETS. Thanks to a premium fabric multilayer design, maximum protection is ensured – for happy dogs, clean & dry floors and even happier dog owners:

– Top: quick absorption of liquids and discharge to 2nd layer – 2nd Layer: high density thickness & extremely absorbent – 3rd Layer: waterproof & breathable to prevent fluids from soaking through to the floor – Bottom: slip reducing fabric to keep the pee pad in place at all times

The extra large 72″x72″ dog exercise pad is a fantastic liner for your whelping box and housebreaking/potty training for a standard size indoor puppy playpen. This mat also suitable for kennels, as well as a car seat, furniture rug pad & hardwood floor protection and can be used for other pets like rabbits, or guinea pigs too.

The practical grey design combined with the black stitching fits perfectly with almost any interior.

Easily Machine washable & reusable – reduce trash, save money & protect the environment No need to buy disposal puppy pee pads, as ZICOTO Pee Pads are easy to take care of and can be reused for a long time to come. Please follow the simple washing instructions to get the most out of your XXL pee pad.

Upgrade your everyday life as dog parent with the washable dog pee pad by ZICOTO PETS!

Note: 1 reusable pad 72″x72″ incl (accessories/supplies shown in the images are not incl.).

4.5
Price: $54.97 - $39.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:30 UTC – Details)
